}}<onlyinclude>The '''E3 2014 Build''' was the first known developmental version of ''[[PlayStation 4 Edition]]'', and also the first known pre-[[PlayStation 4 Edition 1.00|1.0]] version. It was never publicly released but was playable at the {{w|E3 2014}} event and given to many individuals for private testing and showcasing.<ref>{{tweet|4JStudios|474495234588819456|.@ISLAPCreepers Yes, busy preparing E3 builds of #MinecraftPS4, #MinecraftXboxOne and #MinecraftPSVita|June 5, 2014}}</ref>

== Features ==
* Besides it being a developmental build, all the features were identical from the original release.<ref>{{ytl|EMUE3Mm6H9U|Minecraft PS4 Gameplay - Exploring the World - E3 2014|IGN|June 12, 2014}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|chARTz9c4PM|Minecraft PS4 Gameplay - Building Tools - E3 2014|IGN|June 12, 2014}}</ref>{{better source|Needs more reliable sources to whether or not this is the case}}</onlyinclude>
